metadata.titleEn: Fluid data set of rongna deposit, Tibet, China (~118 Ma)
metadata.titleCn: 中国西藏荣那矿床流体数据集（~118 Ma）
metadata.description: 1) The data set includes fluid isotope data, homogenization temperature and salinity of inclusions, and in-situ LA-ICPMS composition data of the Rongna deposit, Tibet; 2) The data come from authoritative laboratories at home and abroad; 3) The data quality meets the standard; 4) Based on this data, the fluid evolution process of the Rongna superlarge porphyry-high sulfidation epithermal deposit in Tibet is reconstructed. Especially, the transformation process of fluid from porphyry to high sulfidation epithermal transition is described. It is found that the copper mineralization of the high sulfidation style in the deposit may be related to the dissolution and reprecipitation of copper minerals formed during porphyry stage. It is expected to provide support for the deepening of metallogenic theory and mineral exploration prediction of porphyry metallogenic system in the future.
metadata.descriptionCn: 1）该数据集主要包括西藏荣那矿床的流体同位素数据，包裹体均一温度和盐度、以及原位LA-ICPMS成分数据；2）数据来自国内外权威实验室分析测试；3）数据质量符合标准；4）利用该数据重塑了西藏荣那超大型斑岩-高硫型浅成低温热液矿床的流体演化过程，尤其是针对流体从斑岩体系向高硫型浅成低温热液体系的转变过程进行了刻画，发现该矿床中高硫体系的铜矿化可能与斑岩体系铜矿物的溶解再沉淀有关，为揭示斑岩-高硫体系套合矿床的成因提供了依据，未来有望为斑岩成矿系统的成矿理论深化和矿产勘查预测提供支持。
metadata.instructionsCn: 荣那流体加文件编号（如1，2，3）

literatureList.titleEn: Porphyry to epithermal transition at the Rongna Cu-(Au) deposit, Tibet: Insights from H-O isotopes and fluid inclusion analysis
literatureList.referenceEn: Zhang, X.N., Li, G.M., Qin, K.Z., Lehmann, B., Li, J.X., Zhao, J.X. (2020). Porphyry to epithermal transition at the Rongna Cu-(Au) deposit, Tibet: Insights from H-O isotopes and fluid inclusion analysis. Ore Geology Reviews, 123, 103585.

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to analyze fluid evolution in mineral deposits, specifically in relation to the transition from porphyry systems to high-sulfidation epithermal systems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于分析矿床中流体演化的数据收集方法的例子，特别是与从斑岩系统过渡到高硫化热液系统相关的？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method involves utilizing fluid isotope data, homogenization temperature and salinity measurements of fluid inclusions, and in-situ LA-ICPMS compositional data from authoritative laboratories. This method allows researchers to reconstruct the fluid evolution process in mineral deposits, highlighting the transition from porphyry systems to high-sulfidation epithermal systems.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及利用流体同位素数据、流体包裹体的均匀化温度和盐度测量，以及来自权威实验室的原位激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICPMS）成分数据。该方法使研究人员能够重建矿床中的流体演化过程，突出从斑岩系统到高硫化热液系统的过渡。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of fluid isotope data in datasets related to mineral deposits?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与矿床相关的数据集中流体同位素数据的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: isotopic composition data, homogenization temperature, salinity of fluid inclusions, in-situ LA-ICPMS compositional data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 同位素组成数据，均一化温度，流体包裹体的盐度，原位LA-ICPMS成分数据

Definition.QuestionEn: What are the key components of a fluid isotope data collection method in geological research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 地质研究中流体同位素数据收集方法的关键组成部分有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: A fluid isotope data collection method in geological research includes collecting fluid isotope data, homogenization temperatures, salinity of inclusions, and in-situ LA-ICPMS compositional data. The data is obtained from authoritative laboratories, ensuring standard quality, and is used to reconstruct the fluid evolution process of geological formations, such as the transition from porphyry to high-sulfidation epithermal systems.
Definition.AnswerCn: 一种流体同位素数据收集方法在地质研究中包括收集流体同位素数据、均一化温度、包裹体的盐度以及原位LA-ICPMS成分数据。这些数据来自权威实验室，确保标准质量，并用于重建地质构造的流体演化过程，例如从斑岩到高硫化热液系统的过渡。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of utilizing fluid isotopic data and in-situ LA-ICPMS compositional data on understanding the fluid evolution process in mineral deposits?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 利用流体同位素数据和原位激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICPMS）成分数据对理解矿床中的流体演化过程有什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing fluid isotopic data and in-situ LA-ICPMS compositional data allows researchers to reconstruct the fluid evolution process of mineral deposits, particularly in understanding the transition of fluid types from porphyry systems to high-sulfidation epithermal systems. This approach provides insights into how high-sulfidation copper mineralization may be related to the dissolution and re-precipitation of copper minerals within the porphyry system, thus offering a foundation for revealing the genesis of porphyry-high sulfidation coupled deposits and potentially supporting advancements in ore-forming theories and mineral exploration predictions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用流体同位素数据和原位激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICPMS）成分数据，研究人员能够重建矿床的流体演化过程，特别是在理解流体类型从斑岩系统向高硫化热液系统转变方面。这种方法提供了对高硫化铜矿化如何与斑岩系统内铜矿物的溶解和再沉淀相关的见解，从而为揭示斑岩-高硫化耦合矿床的成因奠定基础，并可能支持矿床形成理论和矿产勘探预测的进展。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of collecting fluid isotope data, homogenization temperatures, salinity, and in-situ LA-ICPMS compositional data for understanding mineral deposit formations?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集流体同位素数据、均匀化温度、盐度和原位激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICPMS）成分数据的主要目标是理解矿床形成过程。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives are to reconstruct the fluid evolution process of the giant porphyry-high-sulfidation epithermal deposit in the Rongna region of Tibet, particularly to characterize the transition from a porphyry system to a high-sulfidation epithermal system. This helps to provide insights into the genesis of porphyry-high-sulfidation coupled deposits and supports the advancement of mineralization theories and exploration predictions for porphyry mineralization systems.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是重建西藏荣纳地区巨型斑岩-高硫化热液矿床的流体演化过程，特别是表征从斑岩系统到高硫化热液系统的过渡。这有助于提供关于斑岩-高硫化耦合矿床成因的见解，并支持矿化理论和斑岩矿化系统勘探预测的进展。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the specific procedures and laboratory analyses utilized to obtain high-quality fluid isotope data and in-situ LA-ICPMS compositional data for studying the fluid evolution in porphyry-high sulfidation epithermal systems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于研究斑岩-高硫化物热液系统中流体演化的高质量流体同位素数据和原位激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICPMS）成分数据的具体程序和实验室分析有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data collection involves using analyses from authoritative domestic and international laboratories to ensure data quality. The procedures include obtaining fluid isotope data, homogenization temperatures, and salinities from fluid inclusions, as well as in-situ LA-ICPMS compositional data. These methods help in reconstructing the fluid evolution process from porphyry to high sulfidation epithermal systems and understanding the role of copper mineral dissolution and reprecipitation in the high sulfidation system.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据收集涉及使用权威的国内和国际实验室的分析，以确保数据质量。程序包括从流体包裹体中获取流体同位素数据、均匀化温度和盐度，以及原位激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICPMS）成分数据。这些方法有助于重建从斑岩到高硫化热液系统的流体演化过程，并理解铜矿物溶解和再沉淀在高硫化系统中的作用。
